description: A collection of circles in a roughly teardrop-shaped formation with the wide end on top; there is also a thin line of circles extending downward from the bottom of the teardrop-shaped formation and another thin line of circles running horizontally along the bottom of the image. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a long black triangle below the teardrop-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
